actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To repeal the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 relating to the taxation of up to one-half of an individual's social security and certain railroad retirement benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals Internal Revenue Code provisions that include social security and tier I railroad retirement benefits in the gross income of certain taxpayers.

titles.title: To repeal the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 relating to the taxation of up to one-half of an individual's social security and certain railroad retirement benefits.
